Description: Tests a join with an on-clause
MySQL: SELECT * FROM `customer` AS c JOIN `order` AS o

Description: Tests a simple inner join select with on-clause
MySQL: SELECT * FROM `customer` AS c JOIN `order` AS o ON c.`id` = o.`customer` AND :name = 10

Description: Tests an inner join select with a complex on-clause
MySQL: SELECT * FROM `customer` AS c JOIN `order` AS o ON c.`id` = o.`customer` AND ( o.`id` > 100 AND o.`id` < 1000 ) OR ( c.`id` BETWEEN 1 AND 10 AND o.`id` BETWEEN 0 AND 100 )

Description: Tests a select statement with a simple where-clause
Tests a select statement with a complex where-clause
MySQL: SELECT * FROM `customer` AS c WHERE c.`target_group` = 10 AND ( `name` = "jochen" ) OR ( ? BETWEEN 1 AND 2 )

Description: Tests a select statement with an in-clause
MySQL: SELECT * FROM `customer` AS c WHERE c.`id` IN(10, 20, 30) AND `age` IN(SELECT DISTINCT `age` FROM `order`)

Description: Tests a select statement with a join and having
MySQL: SELECT SUM(`age`), `type` FROM `customer` JOIN `order` ON customer.`id` = order.`customer_id` WHERE `id` IN(10, 20, 30) AND `id2` IN(30, 20, 10) GROUP BY `type` HAVING `test` >= 10
